CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES( InvestmentType__c , "PublicMarket"), "PublicMarket; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(InvestmentType__c , "VentureCapital"), "VentureCapital; ", "") & IF( INCLUDES(InvestmentType__c , "PrivateEquity"), "PrivateEquity; ", "") & IF( INCLUDES(InvestmentType__c , "CryptoCurrency"), "CryptoCurrency; ", "") & IF( INCLUDES(InvestmentType__c , "RetailInvestor"), "RetailInvestor; ", "")
CustomField.label: Investment Type
